    • checkPopeSpace

      public void checkPopeSpace​(java.util.List<Player> p, int blackCrossToken) throws GameFinishedException
      this method manages the Faithtrack. Updates player VictoryPoints and actives or discards Players'popfavortiles
      Parameters:
      p - is the Players Vector
      blackCrossToken - is LorenzoIlMagnifico's blackCrossToken (=O if Multiplayer Game)
      Throws:
      GameFinishedException
